NetCDFNoSuchVariableException - Exception in nl.esciencecenter.neon.exceptions
An exception that is generated when a variable was asked for by name (string) that didn't exist in the NetCDF file.
NetCDFNoSuchVariableException(String) - Constructor for exception nl.esciencecenter.neon.exceptions.NetCDFNoSuchVariableException
 
NewNoise - Class in nl.esciencecenter.neon.noise
Currently unused class, stored for reference.
NewNoise() - Constructor for class nl.esciencecenter.neon.noise.NewNoise
 
nl.esciencecenter.neon - package nl.esciencecenter.neon
This package contains the most important classes for the Neon Library and is the root package for all the other Neon packages except for the example implementation.
nl.esciencecenter.neon.datastructures - package nl.esciencecenter.neon.datastructures
Contains the more complex datastructures needed for the operation of the Neon library.
nl.esciencecenter.neon.exceptions - package nl.esciencecenter.neon.exceptions
Contains all possible exceptions of the Neon library.
nl.esciencecenter.neon.input - package nl.esciencecenter.neon.input
The user-input centered classes of the library.
nl.esciencecenter.neon.math - package nl.esciencecenter.neon.math
The matrix/vector math library needed for OpenGL 3.0+ functionality.
nl.esciencecenter.neon.models - package nl.esciencecenter.neon.models
Simple geometric models for use by the library.
nl.esciencecenter.neon.models.graphs - package nl.esciencecenter.neon.models.graphs
Several ready-to-apply generic graph models.
nl.esciencecenter.neon.noise - package nl.esciencecenter.neon.noise
Noise-generation related functionality, like Perlin noise for heightmap textures.
nl.esciencecenter.neon.shaders - package nl.esciencecenter.neon.shaders
GLSL Shader wrapper packages for Object-Oriented shader-enabled programming.
nl.esciencecenter.neon.swing - package nl.esciencecenter.neon.swing
Contains extra Java Swing functionality and ease-of-use for user interfaces.
nl.esciencecenter.neon.text - package nl.esciencecenter.neon.text
Package containing the classes needed to implement 3d and 2d text in jogl.
nl.esciencecenter.neon.text.jogampexperimental - package nl.esciencecenter.neon.text.jogampexperimental
Some poorly-annotated code generated by the JogAmp community for text rendering in JOGL.
nl.esciencecenter.neon.textures - package nl.esciencecenter.neon.textures
The packages needed for texturing objects in the world.
nl.esciencecenter.neon.util - package nl.esciencecenter.neon.util
Utility classes for the Neon library, like a Settings file reader implementation.
noise(double, double, double) - Static method in class nl.esciencecenter.neon.noise.ImprovedPerlinNoise
 
Noise - Class in nl.esciencecenter.neon.noise
Noise creation class for visual effects.
Noise(int, int, int, int) - Constructor for class nl.esciencecenter.neon.noise.Noise
 
normalize(Float2Vector) - Static method in class nl.esciencecenter.neon.math.FloatVectorMath

normalize(Float3Vector) - Static method in class nl.esciencecenter.neon.math.FloatVectorMath

normalize(Float4Vector) - Static method in class nl.esciencecenter.neon.math.FloatVectorMath
Helper method to normalize a vector.
NoSelectionException - Exception in nl.esciencecenter.neon.exceptions
Exception thrown when there was no selection when it was being asked for.
NoSelectionException() - Constructor for exception nl.esciencecenter.neon.exceptions.NoSelectionException
